Title: Poltergeist
Writer: David Lindsay-Abaire (screenplay), Steven Spielberg (based on the 1982 motion picture entitled "Poltergeist" screenplay by), Michael Grais, Mark Victor, Steven Spielberg (based on the 1982 motion picture entitled "Poltergeist" story by)
Actors: Sam Rockwell, Rosemarie DeWitt, Saxon Sharbino, Kyle Catlett
Plot: A family whose suburban home is haunted by evil forces must come together to rescue their youngest daughter after the apparitions take her captive.
